SEARCH
Module OOPCAMSFinalcodes
Package controllers

Class StaffHandler

java.lang.Object
controllers.StaffHandler
public class StaffHandler extends Object
This class provides functionalities for staff members to manage camps. This includes creating camps, changing camp visibility, deleting camps, and editing various aspects of a camp.

  • Method Details

    • createCamps

      public static Camp createCamps(Staff s)
      Creates a new Camp object associated with a staff member.
      Parameters:
      s - The staff member who is creating the camp.
      Returns:
      The newly created Camp object, or null if an exception occurs.

    • changeVis

      public static void changeVis(Camp c)
      Toggles the visibility of a given camp.
      Parameters:
      c - The camp whose visibility is to be toggled.

    • delCamp

      public static void delCamp(Camp c, Staff s)
      Deletes a specified camp from the database and the staff member's list of started camps.
      Parameters:
      c - The camp to be deleted.
      s - The staff member who started the camp.

    • campEditor

      public static boolean campEditor(int choice, Camp c, Staff s)
      Edits the details of a specified camp based on user choices.
      Parameters:
      choice - The choice indicating which detail of the camp to edit.
      c - The camp to be edited.
      s - The staff member editing the camp.
      Returns:
      true if the editing is successful, false otherwise.
